title: Steve Coogan on the evolution of Alan Partridge and 'laughing around mental health, not at it'
description: Comedy character Alan Partridge returns to investigate his own mental health and that of the nation.
content:
"Do you like my orange socks?" asks Steve Coogan.
The British actor is pointing down to a brightly coloured, Argyle patterned pair, worn with brown leather sandals.
"That's where Alan meets Steve," he adds. "In the socks."
By Alan, of course, he is r... [6551 chars]

title: 'Starmer takes on Farage' and 'Two-child benefit cap will be lifted'
description: Sir Keir Starmer's conference speech and the two-child benefit cap make headlines in Wednesday's papers.
content: Most of the newspapers' headlines focus on elements of Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer's speech at the Labour conference in Liverpool. The Mirror leads with Sir Keir's criticism of Reform UK leader Nigel Farage, arguing that "he doesn't believe in Br... [4023 chars]

title: US government shutdown to begin within hours
description: Donald Trump had threatened to lay off "a lot of people" as a result of the shutdown, which comes after Republicans and Democrats failed to agree on a funding package.
content:
The US government is hours away from shutting down for the first time in almost seven years after last-ditch Senate votes on funding plans fell short.
Hundreds of thousands of federal workers deemed not essential for protecting people or property - s... [3440 chars]

title: Princess Anne visits Ukraine to support child war victims
description: She meets children displaced from their families and visited a memorial for young people killed during the war.
content:

title: Hollywood celebrities outraged over new 'AI actor' Tilly Norwood
description: The AI actress is apparently in talks with Hollywood talent agencies to represent her on the big screen.
content:
Hollywood is not rolling out the red carpet for Tilly Norwood – an "AI actor" that has been causing a stir after its Dutch creators said the synthetic performer is in talks with talent agencies.
